abstract: Verizon added 1.3 million new wireless accounts in the first quarter, more than AT&T did despite substantial help from the iPhone.
snippet: Verizon added 1.3 million new wireless accounts in the first quarter, more than AT&T did despite substantial help from the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: Verizon’s financial results, released Monday, underscore a point I made last week: AT&T needs the iPhone more than Verizon does, so it has more incentive to outbid its rival to keep the exclusive deal.

headline.main: Verizon’s Results Show It Doesn’t Need the iPhone
